committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate September 17 of each year as U.S. Constitution Day, and to establish such day as a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates September 17 of each year as "United States Constitution Day". Establishes such day as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to designate September 17 of each year as U.S. Constitution Day, and to establish such day as a legal public holiday.
